title: Draft a Stipulated Protective Order
description: In a case involving confidential information, the parties agree to a stipulated protective order to govern the handling of sensitive documents. An associate needs to draft it.

tasks.description: Select the firm's or court's model protective order template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent starts with a standard, approved form.

tasks.description: Define the different tiers of confidentiality (e.g., 'Confidential', 'Attorneys' Eyes Only').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines the rules for who can see what information.

tasks.description: Circulate the draft to opposing counsel for their review and comment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shares the draft to get agreement from the other side.
